Package game.interfaces

Interface Talkable

All Known Implementing Classes:
Bowser, Enemy, FlyingKoopa, Goomba, Koopa, PiranhaPlant, PrincessPeach, Toad
public interface Talkable
Interface for Actors capable of providing spontaneous dialog.
Uses an interface to implement default methods, emulating multiple inheritance of abstract classes in other languages.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    static final Random
    talkableRandom
    Random number generator.

  • Field Details

    • talkableRandom

      static final Random talkableRandom
      Random number generator. Static final inside an interface. Public because interfaces do not allow for default-private member variables (only for methods)

  • Method Details

    • getDialog

      List<String> getDialog()
      Implement this method to provide a list of possible dialog to be chosen from by processDialog().
      Returns:
      a list of possible dialog to choose from.

    • processDialog

      default void processDialog(Display display)
      Ran inside playTurn, to be processed in every (odd) turn.
      Create an attribute of:
      private int tick = 0;
      and run with:
      if (tick++ % 2 == 0) processDialog(display);
      Parameters:
      display - display instance as given by playTurn.
      See Also:
      • Actor.playTurn(ActionList, Action, GameMap, Display)

    • processDialog

      default String processDialog()
      Same as its method counterpart, except without a display argument. To be used outside the implementing method.
      Returns:
      the chosen string.
      See Also:
      • processDialog(Display)
